name: operatingThreshold
rangeDesc: minimum amount of stake increasing funds, delegation funds, or delegation withdrawing funds, range: [10000000000000000000, 10000000000000000000000]

name: unStakeFreezeDuration
rangeDesc: quantity of epoch for skake withdrawal, range: (MaxEvidenceAge, 112]

name: slashFractionDuplicateSign
rangeDesc: quantity of base point(1BP=1‱). Node's stake will be deducted(BPs*staking amount*1‱) it the node sign block duplicatlly, range: (0, 10000]

name: duplicateSignReportReward
rangeDesc: quantity of base point(1bp=1%). Bonus(BPs*deduction amount for sign block duplicatlly*%) to the node who reported another's duplicated-signature, range: (0, 80]

name: maxEvidenceAge
rangeDesc: quantity of epoch. During these epochs after a node duplicated-sign, others can report it, range: (0, UnStakeFreezeDuration)

name: slashBlocksReward
rangeDesc: quantity of block, the total bonus amount for these blocks will be deducted from a inefficient node's stake, range: [0, 50000)

name: maxBlockGasLimit
rangeDesc: maximum gas limit per block, range: [4712388, 210000000]
